body portion 18 of the insulator 10 is held with the holding member 700 a measurement unit 200 300 400 that is configured to set a certain point in the direction of the axis CL on the leg portion 13 as a first measurement point to set a certain point in the direction of the axis CL on a portion of the insulator 10 other than the leg portion 13 as a second measurement point and then to perform measurement of a distance D in a radial distance of the insulator 10 between an outer circumferential surface of the leg portion 13 at the first measurement point and an outer circumferential surface of the portion of the insulator 10 other than the leg portion 13 at the second measurement point wherein the measurement is performed at a plurality of positions in a circumferential direction of the insulator 10 with no contact to the leg portion 13 and the portion of the insulator 10 other than the leg portion 13 by changing the position of the measurement in accordance with the rotation of the
